title: Oakley and Pas Normal Studios Collection
content:
Oakley and Pas Normal Studios join forces for their first limited-edition cycling collection, with both performance and everyday eyewear, technical gear, and casual wear, while leaning on Oakley’s iconography and PNS’ silhouettes…

The sunglasses and apparel limited edition collection merges Oakley’s staple silhouettes with Pantone colors Pas Normal Studios is known for: black, olive, and purple. The Cycling Kit merges performance with contemporary design on the bike, while the Casual Wear Collection includes off-race pieces for everyday adventures.

Purposefully designed, the Pas Normal Studios x Oakley Cycling Kit includes:

  • Pas Normal Studios x Oakley Encoder Strike: Pas Normal Studios Encoder Strike blend functionality with heritage elements of Oakley Razor Blades to offer a premium experience, built for cyclists seeking a competitive edge. The lightweight, durable frames are complete with a vented Plutonite® lens for optimal airflow and Pas Normal Studios etching between the brows.
  • Pas Normal Studios x Oakley Radar Ev Path: A widely considered sport-eyewear classic, Radar® EV Path® forged its way to the Pas Normal Studios® by cyclist demand. The limited-edition style features a timeless color combination of a glossy bone-colored frame and a purple Ellipse icon on the temple.
  • Pas Normal Studios x Oakley Terrigal: Hardwired into both brand DNA’s, cycling is definitely more than two wheels – It’s a lifestyle. Knowing that we wandered off the traditional sport-performance eyewear path and brought on a distinctive Pas Normal Studios® Terrigal to fulfill the everyday needs.
  • Apparel ranging from performance road kits to lifestyle.

 

See more at Pas Normal Studios.

The post Oakley and Pas Normal Studios Collection appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
